channel.title: Axoloti stock in the near future?
channel.description:
Any idea about when there will be more axoloti´s stock? I am checking every day weeks ago but it says "out of stock" and any update about future sales.
I would really appreciate any clue about availability.
Thanks

item.description:
@xoanxil wrote:

Thanks @omgzilla. I would prefer a not previously soldered core.

item.title: Axoloti stock in the near future?
item.dc:creator: @xoanxil xoanxil
item.description:
@xoanxil wrote:

Thanks @kale. I tried to get some second hand Axoloti but they are sold really fast.

Yes I know about Akso. Actually I have got one and just received it some days ago. Nevertheless I need an Axoloti because I was working on a very specific project and I have just ready the enclosure.

But when I started to mount everything together I found that my board has two damaged pins , so I need another Axoloti to replace it. Anyway it would be great to have some feedback about what can we expect about future batches.

In the mean time I will be attentive to future Axoloti used offers.

Read full topic
item.source: Axoloti stock in the near future?

item.title: Axoloti stock in the near future?
item.dc:creator: @kale
item.description:
@kale wrote:

I was lucky to find a second hand one from a guy who bought it new in august. sorry but i dont really know the timing, keep looking out i think probably something will show up because a few months has past from the last batch, but really i am just supposing here. you probably know about Akso dsp platform, it is kind of the same but with mini trs and no onboard midi din in/out (, but its supported) it cost a little bit more(still cheap) but its also more powerful, it runs a modified axoloti patcher. actually i see it is also out of stock. anyway goodluck, eventually you will get one

Read full topic
